title: b4checkin Partners with Ronald McDonald House of New YorkTravelandtourworld.com
text:
b4checkin Partners with Ronald McDonald House of New York Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
b4checkin is proud to announce its completion of a fully customized booking engine platform for Ronald McDonald House New York (RMH-NY).
As a nonprofit organization offering support programs for children, its needs for a booking engine are quite unique and outside the scope of hospitality products typically offered. b4checkin was thrilled to undertake the work as it was for a great cause.
Coordinating with RMH-NY’s Property Management System provider to accommodate bookings through its interface, b4checkin designed a special reservation portal capable of managing patient and family bookings from 21 different hospitals in the New York area.
After removing all credit card processing and filtering out the hotel lingo, the platform is built in such a way that only authorized social workers can create reservations at the RMH-NY facility using unique login credentials for secured access. Attached to this is an Administration Portal to prioritize the admission approval process and to log patient information. b4checkin also installed an automated criminal record background check feature.
“We knew that our requirement of an out-of-the-box booking engine would be a challenge for any booking engine provider to complete, but b4checkin came highly recommended by our property management system provider. We couldn’t be happier that we approached them. b4checkin was with us every step of the way during the development process and the final product speaks for itself,” said Edward Cho, Information Technology Manager, Ronald McDonald House New York.
“b4checkin is pleased that RMH-NY chose us to undertake this development project. This project was made possible by our leading edge adaptive reservation platform and we’re excited to help RMH streamline its unique booking processes.” said Steve Miles, VP Operations, b4checkin.
